articles.author: Shivani Bazaz
articles.title: REC focusing on energy transition in India, eyeing 20% share in projects: CMD Vivek Kumar Devangan - CNBCTV18
articles.description: REC CMD Vivek Kumar Devangan also said that in the last six quarters, the company hasn’t added any new NPAs. He added that in the next two years, REC aims to become a net zero NPA company.

articles.title: Siddhartha Khemka on why Bajaj Finance saw a sell-off post results - The Economic Times
articles.description: Mumbai-based MOFSL's Siddhartha Khemka says he has a positive view on Bajaj Finance despite the recent sell-off in response to its in-line Q1 results. He said the addition of new products to its range of services should help the firm grow. Khemka also expects…
articles.content: Siddhartha Khemka, Head-Retail Research, MOFSL, says Overall, the numbers are in line with our expectations. Today's reaction is a bit of a sell-on-news kind of thing but we have a very positive view… [+3715 chars]
